column2: A basic responsive grid for winners. This project is based on Chris Coyier's post on grids http://css-tricks.com/dont-overthink-it-grids/

column5: Removed setting all elements to border-box

fix ipad portrait issue.
when using padded grid on ipad in portrait mode, width should be viewport-width - padding = (768 - 20) = 748. actually, it should be even smaller to allow for padding of grid containing element.
